title: DdD - Infrasec Setup DdDAdmin
text: Log into DdD Admin - advance confirguration. InfrasecAgentCert the name of the certificate - receiced when registering customer´s POS InfrasecAgentCertPassword* Password - receiced when registering customer´s POS InfrasecAppID DdD Retail (always) InfrasecCaCert ca_sha256.cer (DdD certiface - always the same) InfrasecManRegID the name of the certificate receiced when registering customer´s POS - without .p12 InfrasecUrl https://ccu.infrasec.se/ctuclient (always the same) IMPORTANT: add customers Org number to Both certifcate, the DdD and the shop, har du put into the POS folder - mask_20X - send til kasse. Make sure the POS i picking up the certificates. *InfrasecAgentCertPassword Find the klient you want wo access, find Acces Tokens, press somewhere i the middle of the token: (Serial) Remember to press the "Credentials" (3) button to make the password visible.
description:
Log into DdD Admin - advance confirguration. 


InfrasecAgentCert                      the name of the certificate - receiced when registering customer´s POS

InfrasecAgentCertPassword*      Password - receiced when registering customer´s POS 

InfrasecAppID                            DdD Retail (always)

InfrasecCaCert                            ca_sha256.cer (DdD certiface - always the same)

InfrasecManRegID                      the name of the certificate receiced when registering customer´s POS - without .p12

InfrasecUrl                                   https://ccu.infrasec.se/ctuclient (always the same)


IMPORTANT: add customers Org number to 




Both certifcate, the DdD and the shop, har du put into the POS folder -  mask_20X - send til kasse. 


Make sure the POS i picking up the certificates.


*InfrasecAgentCertPassword 


Find the klient you want wo access, find Acces Tokens, press somewhere i the middle of the token: (Serial)


Remember to press the "Credentials" (3) button to make the password visible.

title: Infrasec on Imagine
text: You can add the Infrasec Modul to the Tenant on the Portal. Find the Tenant Select ShopFeature Select a Store 1.) Select Shop Feature Template Choose SwedishFiscalisation and apply The template will not show the right components, please delete them all and addt details row by row starting with the button row (4): Active bool true ConnectorOptions json [{ mac: "Connector-Mac Address", organizationNumber: "Org nr without -", registerId: "Tillverkningsnr.", storePayload: true }]
description:
You can add the Infrasec Modul to the Tenant on the Portal. 

Find the Tenant

Select ShopFeature

Select a Store

1.) Select Shop Feature Template

Choose SwedishFiscalisation and apply

The template will not show the right components, please delete them all

and addt details row by row starting with the button row (4):


Active    bool    true      

ConnectorOptions    json    [{ mac: "Connector-Mac Address", organizationNumber: "Org nr without -", registerId: "Tillverkningsnr.", storePayload: true }]

title: Download certificate
text: Find customer on infrasec´s homepage (indivituel access) Find Acces Tokens Click on the Token Change: Distibution from Distributed to Pending - Save and download Customer certificate (K3D0000XXXXXXXXX.p12) and our certificate (ca_sha256.cer) has to be put into the machines ftp account in sent_til_kasse ftp://ftp01.dddretail.com/klient_XXXXXX/mask_0XXX/send_til_kasse/
description:
Find customer on infrasec´s homepage (indivituel access) 


Find Acces Tokens

Click on the Token

Change: Distibution from Distributed to Pending - Save and download


Customer certificate (K3D0000XXXXXXXXX.p12) and our certificate (ca_sha256.cer) has to be put into the machines 

ftp account in sent_til_kasse


ftp://ftp01.dddretail.com/klient_XXXXXX/mask_0XXX/send_til_kasse/

title: CVR Number
text: It is important to change the CVR number from 1234567890 to the correct one. Otherwise Infrasec will come up with an error.
description:
It is important to change the CVR number from 1234567890 to the correct one. Otherwise Infrasec will come up with

an error.
